[{"id":"JT-49330","entityId":"25-2122906","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"49330"},{"name":"summary","value":"Broken links on project overview page"},{"name":"description","value":"

STR:

  1. Go to https://agile-70-test.myjetbrains.com/youtrack
  2. Go to Projects
  3. Select a project
  4. Click a link in the right panel

ER: You are redirected to the corresponding page
AR: You are redirected to Dashboard page

It seems that context is not taken in account when building links.

"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1537540596074"},{"name":"updated","value":"1537547922066"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Maxim.Maximov"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Max Maximov"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"alexander.buturlinov"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexander Buturlinov"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"0"},{"name":"votes","value":"0"},{"name":"markdown","value":"true"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"JT-49327","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"Maxim.Maximov","fullName":"Max Maximov"}]},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 76","id":"YouTrack:sprint 76"}]}],"comment":[],"tag":[]}, {"id":"JT-47736","entityId":"25-2025115","jiraId":null,"field":[{"name":"projectShortName","value":"JT"},{"name":"numberInProject","value":"47736"},{"name":"summary","value":"Activity stream: can not navigate to an item by link from a comment in the same issue"},{"name":"description","value":"
STR:
  • Copy a link to a stream item
  • Paste it into a comment in the same issue
  • Try clicking the resulting link

ER: The item from the first point is selected and navigated to.
AR: The URL is changed correctly, but the comment from p.2 is selected.
"},{"name":"wikified","value":"true"},{"name":"created","value":"1529421559802"},{"name":"updated","value":"1537532017395"},{"name":"updaterName","value":"Tatiana.Shabaeva"},{"name":"updaterFullName","value":"Tatiana Shabaeva"},{"name":"reporterName","value":"Alexander.Volfman"},{"name":"reporterFullName","value":"Alexander Volfman"},{"name":"commentsCount","value":"3"},{"name":"votes","value":"1"},{"name":"markdown","value":"false"},{"name":"links","value":[{"value":"YTB-636","type":"Relates","role":"relates to"},{"value":"YTB-422","type":"Subtask","role":"subtask of"}]},{"name":"State","value":["Open"],"valueId":["Open"],"color":{"bg":"#fed74a","fg":"#444"}},{"name":"Assignee","value":[{"value":"xi-eye","fullName":"Alexander Anisimov"}]},{"name":"Subsystem","value":["Single Issue View"],"valueId":["Single Issue View"],"color":null},{"name":"Component","value":["Frontend"],"valueId":["Frontend"],"color":null},{"name":"Type","value":["Bug"],"valueId":["Bug"],"color":null},{"name":"Priority","value":["Normal"],"valueId":["Normal"],"color":{"bg":"#e6f6cf","fg":"#4da400"}},{"name":"sprint","value":[{"value":"sprint 76","id":"YouTrack:sprint 76"}]},{"name":"voterName","value":[{"value":"Tatiana.Shabaeva","fullName":"Tatiana Shabaeva"}]}],"comment":[{"id":"27-3072412","author":"Tatiana.Shabaeva","authorFullName":"Tatiana Shabaeva","issueId":"JT-47736","parentId":null,"deleted":false,"jiraId":null,"text":"
Alexander Anisimov Can this be prioritized? Makes it hard to use comments in the same issue as a reference when communicating with users.
